descriptions: Main website created
How to use plugins
How to contribute plugins
Pyxu score explained

Pyxu FAIR: a platform for development, sharing, and integration of specialized plugins to enhance the Pyxu framework, with a catalogue website offering searchable, ranked, auto-discovered plugin listings and metadata display
Catalogue Website: a one-stop shop to discover exciting Pyxu plugins, auto-discovery from PyPI, relevant metadata, fuzzy-searchable index, rank plugins by Pyxu score
Plugin catalogue
Catalogue Website: a searchable, auto-discovered plugin catalog with metadata and scoring
Plugin Catalogue: Alphabetical list and search of all Pyxu plugins with types and scores
Pyxu Plugin Generator
Added interoperability protocol to core Pyxu package
Contributed Pyxu trove-classifier in PyPI
CSEEG plugin (Solver type, version Pyxu 2.0.0, planning stage)
DSP-Notebooks plugin (Operator, Stop, Math, Contrib types, stable, Pyxu 2.0.0, score 83.0%)
EnvironTracker plugin (Contrib type, alpha, Pyxu 2.0.0, score 79.0%)
Alphabetical plugin list: CSEEG, DSP-Notebooks, EnvironTracker, HoughDetector, HVOX, OrientationPy, Palentologist, PhaseRet, PycGSP, pycNUFFT, PycSphere, pycWavelet
Operator (17 plugins in 12 packages), Solver (14 plugins in 10 packages), Stop (18 plugins in 11 packages), Math (16 plugins in 10 packages), Contrib (20 plugins in 12 packages)
Pyxu Plugin Generator
Added interoperability protocol to core Pyxu package
EIAS Summer School 2023 (presentation of Pyxu and plugins)
Imaging lunch (26.04.2023)
Manuscript under preparation on Pyxu and Pyxu-FAIR. To be submitted to JOSS by the end of the year
Minisymposium at PASC 2023 (Davos, Switzerland)
Conference talk at PoLBIAS 2023 (Dresden, Germany)

config.system_prompt:
EXTRACTION STRATEGY:
  1. PRIMARY: Look for data in the specified location/table/section
  2. FALLBACK: If not found, search broader document context for semantically equivalent information
  3. FLEXIBILITY: Allow for format variations, OCR errors, and synonym usage

  LOCATION FLEXIBILITY:
  - Handle table format variations (column/row order, spacing, naming)
  - Consider synonyms and equivalent terms
  - Account for OCR/parsing errors that may affect document quality

  QUALITY STANDARDS:
  - Extract actual values found in the document
  - If uncertain, provide best interpretation with appropriate confidence
  - Only return null if the information category truly doesn't exist
  - Convert abbreviated amounts (k=1000) to full numbers where applicable
  

  REPORT OUTPUT FOCUS:
  - 15 standard output categories in "List of Outputs" table
  - Each category: quantity number, descriptions list, URLs list
  - Separate descriptions from URLs even when mixed in same cell
  - Academic collaborations vs Industrial partnerships (distinct categories)
  - Preserve all detailed descriptions and web addresses
